name: Council of Birds by John Suave
name_original: Council of Birds by John Suave
description:
The council know about your desire, they are gonna help you but first you must do something in exchange. Kill the rebels in this 5-10 minutes 2D Shooter to finally make your dream become true, turn yourself into a bird. Short story with a final decision and a twist.

Have fun and give some feedback to help John Suave grow as a game developer.

Royalty free music from https://www.fesliyanstudios.com
